# [Interview #1078: Steelheart Signing Report - Shardlet, Entry #17](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1078#17)

#### Question

Is he [Hoid] a Worldsinger?

#### Brandon Sanderson

He has a relationship with the Worldsingers.
